title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS – Toyota Landcruiser 70 Series 4.5L TD Dual Battery and ARB Compressor – Pre Filter Water Separator Kit Fuel Manager

content.rendered:
New Fuel Manager Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit for:

Toyota Landcruiser (2007-on) 4.5L 70 Series
V8 Turbo Diesel 1VD
All models with dual battery / arb compressor.

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. Kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need and even where to fit it !

Kit FM625DPK Includes:
A. Fuel Manager 30 micron Filtration Unit
Made by Stanadyne in the USA !
(Filters down to 30 Microns !)

B. Mounting Bolts, Washers & Nyloc Nuts
C. Spare 30 Micron Replacement Filter
D. 2m 1/2 Inch Quality Fuel Hose
E. Filter Bracket
F. Blanking Plugs
G. 2x Brass 90 degree fittings
H. 2x Brass spacers
I. 2x Brass Y, inch hose tails
J. Hose Clamps
K. Cable Ties
L. 1x 8mm bolt, washer & nylock nut
M. 1x 6mm bolt, washer & nylock nut
Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

Download PDF Info >

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
